title: Elimin8 | Odor Eliminator For Hairpieces & Wigs (8oz)
body_html:
Elimin8 - Organic Odor Eliminator Hairspray is the most potent anti-odor for hairpieces and wigs in the market. It works better than anything else you've tried! Over time, dirt, oils, and environmental pollutants can take its toll on your hair and leave it less than fresh. Worry no more! Pro Hair Labs developed an extremely economical product to effectively tackle and exterminate odor sources. Made from organic and natural microorganisms to rebalance and revive the level of scents. Smells good and neutralizes hair odors! This product is cost-effective and easy to use too, simply spray it over the top of the hair system after the cosmetic bonding process to complete and enjoy the refreshing results.

  • ODOR NEUTRALIZER - Elimin8 from Pro Hair Labs, made from Ireland, effectively tackle and exterminate odors at the source, using natural microorganisms to rebalance and revive the scents level. Stand alone odor eliminator designed for hair replacement systems. Designed to neutralize and remove odors from hair replacement units caused by dirt, oils, and environmental pollutants.
  • MADE FROM NATURAL INGREDIENTS - Your health is our top priority. Pro Hair Labs Elimin8 odor neutralizer are completely organic and natural. Elimin8 ia a bioremediancatalyst which used microorganisms to retain the natural balance of scent levels. Trusted and Recommended by Leading Hair Extension Professionals Worldwide
  • SAFE TO USE - Made with natural and organic ingredients, contains no latex and harsh solvents making it 100% safe for scalp and skin. Our hairspray is suitable for all hair types, including curly, straight and color-treated hair. Appropriate to use for both men and women.
  • EASY APPLICATION - Elimin8 is cost effective - simply spray it over the top of the hair systems after the cosmetic bonding process to complete, and enjoy the refreshing odor-free result. Our product is maximum strength, eliminating the toughest odors. The most powerful odor remover for all types of hair extensions, lace Wigs, toupees, and tape-In Systems.
  • FOR POLY AND LACE SYSTEM - Elimin8 Odor Eliminator works well on lace and poly hair system. Effective in neutralizing odor built up on wigs. Suitable for everyone and all types of activities. It is colorless and made with certified organic essential oils of only the highest quality.​
